title: The Psalmes of David, from the new translation of the Bible turned into meter: to be sung after the old tunes used in the churches.
author: King, Henry, 1592-1669.
publisher: Printed by Ed. Griffin, and are to be sold by Humphrey Moseley, at the Princes Armes in St. Pauls Church-yard,
notes: Translator's preface signed: H.K., B. C., i.e. Henry King, Bishop of Chichester.
With an additional title page, engraved, signed: Ro: Vaughan sculp.
Reproductions of the originals in the Library of Congress (Early English books) and the British Library (Thomason Tracts).
